```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r load data}
my_data <- data.table(read_csv("data/Kitui_subcounties.csv"))

```




```{r Long format data frame}
my_data.long <- my_data %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with(c("Land","Population", "Population D", "No.of", "Household", "Average")),
    names_to = "Site_Data",
    names_prefix = NULL,
    values_to = "Numbers",
    values_drop_na = TRUE
  )
View(my_data.long)

```


```{r Write csv}
fwrite(my_data.long, "data/Kitui_subcounties.csv")
```
